dc:title: Tobacco Road
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: A woman tells of her role in the play "Tobacco Road" and Dorothy who goes to see it describes her horror at how the audience laughed at every obscenity that appeared on stage.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 77 1943-11-26 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
